questions.question: Confirm the equipment with below provided image of the equipment.
upload the image of the equipment, contact the technical team for recorrections and scan the bar code again.
confirm is there any physical damage of the equipment.
prepare the Incident / Damage and Missing report.
connect the equipment to the mains and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON.
check and confirm whether the wall outlet is provided with AC voltage of 230.
shift the equipment where the wall outlet is provided with AC Voltage of 230
check the continuity of power cord and confirm whether the power cord is defective.

videos.src: assets/videos/CHECKING THE CONTINUITY OF POWER CORD.mp4
videos.videoName: CHECKING THE CONTINUITY OF POWER CORD

questions.question: replace the power cord with a new one
check the AC Fuses continuity and confirm whether the fuses are defective.
replace the fuses with the new one
check and confirm whether there is any carbon formation / breakage of Input module.
replace the Input module with a new one
open the equipment as shown in the video, check for any loose connections / breakage of cable from Input module to power supply board.
reseat / replace the cable accordingly
check and confirm whether the output is available at power supply board.
repair / replace the power supply board accordingly
check the connection from power supply to control board for any loose connections / breakage of cable.
reseat / replace the cable accordingly
repair / replace the control board accordingly

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the control board

questions.question: Check and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON without connecting to mains.
replace the battery with a new one
check and confirm whether the time period for charging paddles is high.
replace the charging board with a new one
check and confirm whether paddles off / paddles not connected message appears on display.
reseat / reconnect the paddles properly and confirm whether the message still appears.
check whether any carbon formation, loose connection or breakage at the pin connector.
clean, reconnect or replace the connector accordingly
open the equipment as shown, check whether there are any loose connections internally.
reseat the cables properly
check and confirm whether unable discharge the energy.
replace the charging board with a new one
check and confirm whether some of the buttons / buttons do not respond on the keypad.
open the equipment as shown in the video, check for loose connection / breakage of cable from switch control to control board.
reseat / replace the cable with a new one
repair / replace the switch control board and confirm whether the problem still persist.

videos.videoName: Video for replacing switch control board

questions.question: replace the control board with a new one

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the control board

questions.question: If the problem is not yet solved, contact the Technical Team for any other assistance through video call.
Thanks
